result.eng: The first thing he reads is the sports page.
result.ga: An leathanach spóirt an chéad rud a léann sé
result.orig: An leathanach spóirt an chéad rud a léann sé
result.html: An leathanach spóirt an chéad rud a léann séThe first thing he reads is the sports page.
result.ponchtml: An leaṫanaċ spóirt an ċéad rud a léann séThe first thing he reads is the sports page.

result.eng: All the names were listed on the page.
result.ga: Bhí na hainmneacha go léir liostaithe ar an leathanach
result.orig: Bhí na hainmneacha go léir liostaithe ar an leathanach
result.html: Bhí na hainmneacha go léir liostaithe ar an leathanachAll the names were listed on the page.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí na hainmneaċa go léir liostaiṫe ar an leaṫanaċAll the names were listed on the page.

result.eng: Do not leave this page blank.
result.ga: Ná fág an leathanach seo bán
result.orig: Ná fág an leathanach seo bán
result.html: Ná fág an leathanach seo bánDo not leave this page blank.
result.ponchtml: Ná fág an leaṫanaċ seo bánDo not leave this page blank.

result.ga: Scríobh cúig leathanach ar a mhéad

result.html: Scríobh cúig leathanach ar a mhéadWrite five pages at most.
result.ponchtml: Scríoḃ cúig leaṫanaċ ar a ṁéadWrite five pages at most.
